text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: ClimbingStairs indicates the extent to which a patient is capable of going up and down stairs independently.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the ClimbingStairs concept (NL-CM:4.3.18) of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Mobility v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Mobility-v3.3(2020EN)).

comment.value: This Observation resource represents the ClimbingStairs concept (NL-CM:4.3.18) of zib Mobility. It can be used together with the [zib-Mobility](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.

definition.value: ClimbingStairs indicates the extent to which a patient is capable of going up and down stairs independently.
